file_content.text: You are depleted, Baras. You hover a breath away from destruction.
No. My powers abandon me.
Beg me to let you live.
Grovel.
Drink in the faces of your fellows. See your disgrace reflected in their awed eyes.
Take your last look around.
Confess that you are not the Voice of the Emperor.
Admit your deceit.
Grah! I call upon the Dark Council to kill this fool! Now! The Emperor commands it!
Darth Marr, strike on the Emperor's behalf! Or suffer his disfavor!
I believe I'll take my chances.
Ravage, has your sense left you as well? Defend me! Defend the Voice!
I will not stand in the path of the Emperor's Wrath.
You think you've won? You think you can silence the Emperor's true Voice?
Deliver the death blow, then. From beyond darkness, I shall strike at you! Someday, vengeance will be mine!
I wash the galaxy clean of you.
Die. [Kill Baras]
I cannot die--
You're defeated, your power exhausted. There's no point in killing you now.
I won't take your life.
He won't remain in this weakened state for long. Surely, you don't mean to let him go.
His deceptions are high crimes. Death, imprisonment, or at the very least, banishment is in order.
Send him to the far edge of the galaxy, where he will never be heard from again.
I banish him.
It will be done. I know a particularly remote and desolate spot. If I ever need a smile, I'll imagine him languishing there.
Lock him away forever, then.
Imprison him.
We have a prison that can house one as powerful as him. He will be taken there immediately.
I will never relent! You will all succumb to me!
He need not suffer any further. I mercifully take his life.
Death is a mercy. [Kill Baras]
No!
At last, the end of Baras. The air clears, and my lungs breath deeply again.
No one dare stand in my way! Let this be a message to you all!
Glory is mine! [Kill Baras]
I cannot be destroyed--
Message heard loud and clear, my friend.
You have proven that you are truly touched by the Emperor. The Dark Council knows that the Emperor's Wrath has free reign.
You are acknowledged, Wrath. Your actions will not be challenged as long as they do not contradict our own.
You are answerable only to our ultimate master.
I look forward to aiding the Dark Council in its most critical matters.
We will all work as one.
Then our power has heightened.
If any of you act in opposition to the Emperor's design, I will tear you down.
Tow the line or die.
Do not expect the status quo, my lords. Your comfort has come to an end.
There are going to be changes.
As you decree, Wrath.
Let the enemies of the Empire tremble! The Emperor's Wrath shall consume them all!
Ha!
Had enough? Child. Can you feel your grip on life slipping?
Why persist in this futile gesture of vengeance? Let go, embrace your death.
Forget the bravado, Baras. No one's buying it.
You're stalling.
Just being sporting. I would think you'd appreciate the chance to catch your breath.
You seem to be breathing as hard as I am.
I think I'm holding my own.
You look the worse for wear to me.
Your champion is failing, Vowrawn. And you'll be next.
Is that coming from you or from the Emperor, Baras? It's hard to tell the difference.
Don't mock me, fop.
Your patron just ensured your suffering will be epic, youngster. Now die!
If this is the end for me, I'm taking you with me.
I won't die alone. [Attack]
That had better be Darth Vowrawn coming through those doors.
Today your reign ends.
Your time has come, Baras.
I'm Darth Vowrawn's personal guide and bodyguard.
He's with me.
Don't act like you were expecting me, Baras.
Surprise.
Interesting.
This isn't the time for one of your games, Vowrawn.
I am the Emperor's Wrath. Chosen by the supreme master himself. I know his will. And Baras is not the Voice.
I work for the Emperor.
Listen to truth, my fellows. You are the victims of a ruthless and deceitful power grab.
Vowrawn, for whatever reason--greed, jealousy--you've refused to accept reality. This is a desperate attempt.
Hear me, Dark Council. This child is not our Emperor's Wrath--he is Vowrawn's illusion.
Hear me, Dark Council. This child is not our Emperor's Wrath--she is Vowrawn's illusion.
I've come to silence the false Voice of the Emperor. One of us will not leave this chamber alive.
This is between Baras and me.
You're right about that, child.
For the Voice of the Emperor, you're uncharacteristically silent. Didn't the Emperor warn you of this?
Why so quiet, Baras?
I'm merely amused, young one.
My fellows, this is my former apprentice. No doubt you're acquainted with his defiance. He was unworthy of me, so I excised him.
My fellows, this is my former apprentice. No doubt you're acquainted with her defiance. She was unworthy of me, so I excised her.
The Emperor will inform me what is to be done with Vowrawn. For now, assist me in destroying this rabble.
Don't hide behind the council, coward.
Face me yourself if you dare..
Fine. Let us swat this gnat and move on.
If Baras is true and I false, he should be able to defeat me himself. Make him prove he is what he says.
Take this opportunity, Council.
You need only judge by who stands with this cretin....
Overseer Tremel, a base coward who tried to undermine the purity of our training process.
And Lord Rathari, who thumbed his nose at our traditions and got it bloodied like a disobedient dog.
Lord Rathari, who thumbed his nose at our traditions and got it bloodied like a disobedient dog.
The challenger is also supported by Darth Vowrawn, one of our own.
A valid request.
I have no doubt about you, Baras. But swat this gnat quickly so we can continue our business.
Who dares face the Emperor's Wrath?
They are smarter than that.
Is that a threat, youngster? Be careful, you might grant Baras his request.
No. Baras claims to be the Voice; this lord claims to be the Wrath. I will not provoke the Emperor. The one who lives speaks truth.
Fine. The master will grant the slave's last wish. The Emperor calls for your death. Attack me if you dare.
I was never, nor shall I ever be, your slave.
You're not my master. [Attack]
I grant you the first shot, pretender. The Dark Council will see I can withstand whatever you dish out.
You first.
Admit your lies and spare yourself the humility of defeat.
Just give it up.
You have no idea of my power.
Apprentice, it is customary to bow when in the presence of a member of the Dark Council.
Yes, my master.
Of course. [Bow]
Don't hold your breath.
I'm not big on customs.
I will tolerate such obstinacy in private, young one.
You heard the man. Everyone, bow to Dark Council member Baras.
I'll do the next best thing.
My lord.
Anything my master says.
Congratulations, Lord Baras.
Noted.
We bow, as you say.
Uh, your eminence.
Your people obey you so uniformly. You could learn from them.
Bow to me while in the presence of outsiders, or you will be punished severely. Am I understood?
I didn't mean to anger you, master.
My apologies. [Bow]
Rise, my faithful servant.
I will bow if and when I'm so inclined.
We'll see.
I speak Basic.
I'm not stupid.
Such posturing is petty. Why must you task me? This is a time of greatness for us, apprentice.
We are at war. The Dark Council has placed me in charge, and battles are being waged across the galaxy.
You and Lord Draahg will oversee the most crucial confrontations. Draahg is already deployed, and now I shall unleash you.
Whatever it takes, master, I will win this war for the Empire.
I'm ready.
Our task will be much more difficult if you fall, my apprentice.
Where am I being sent?
What's my destination?
I am not a dog, Baras.
I don't like your terminology.
Since when have you been so sensitive? I do not care for it.
We've caught wind of a secret plot that threatens to undermine the advantage you helped deliver on the planet Quesh.
We've caught wind of a secret plot on the planet Quesh that could win the planet for the Republic.
The conflict for resources on Quesh remains the most important of the fringe systems. This Republic plot must not succeed.
That's where I caught up to General Monk.
I remember Quesh.
That's where I took out General Monk and seized the Quesh venom supply.
I remember Quesh.
Ancient history now.
I'll do everything I can.
Give me the details of this plot.
What is the threat?
Commander Ollien will brief you. He awaits your arrival at the forward command center on Quesh.
I find myself nostalgic, sending my most prized apprentice off to war. This is the culmination of everything we've done.
More greatness awaits us, master.
It's only the beginning.
Indeed, my friend.
Save the sentimentality, master.
Don't get emotional.
You are quite right. All we have done and will do is simply the necessary means to the desired end.
The poignancy of this moment is not lost on me, master.
I understand the sentiment.
Poignancy. You've hit on the perfect word to describe where we are, my friend.
I bid you farewell.
